channel.title: fleets on hattie, today
channel.description: Recent content in fleets on hattie, today

item.title: The revolution will be complete when the language is perfect
item.description: He moved over to the window Since about that time, war had been literally continuous, though strictly speaking it had not always been the same war. For several months during his childhood there had been confused street fighting in London itself, some of which he remembered vividly. Inside the flat a fruity voice was reading out a list of figures which had something to do with the production of pig iron.

item.title: On an unsung name
item.description: i am rebirth of new seasons i am pitcherfull of sweet i am an unmelting snowflake that may thursday meet mister hide out and at it again pretending he likes me in front of his friends fine tuned possession lives one day at a time for my silent lysistrata my unannounced rhyme

item.title: I surprise you in a Lowe's
item.description: the way you draw a face passed down unto mine: drawn like a graph not passed down, i should clean and fold and check my bank account daily, i’m again overdrawn or drowning. yes terday i asked for your help slowing down. today i found you mourning in a lowes, we hold each other in an instance: a joke about fruit flies from a false kitchen we do not recognize.
